body_html:
I just want to avoid the endless build when we have an error that causes a
deadlock in session.run or some such. It happened before.
On Wed, Mar 23, 2016 at 07:41 Geoffrey Irving notifications@github.com
wrote:

Jenkins, test this please.

@martinwicke https://github.com/martinwicke: Preferences? I'm not the
right person to judge the usefulness, since I'm not familiar with the
details of timeouts.

—
You are receiving this because you were mentioned.
